definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bend, bend down, be bent, bowed (NH bend, overturn, As. kapâpu, bend, bow, Dl:HWB 347; Ar. kaf=a fell a seam, also turn back, avert, kuf=ah;un selvage, kifa0fun circuit, rim; Aram. [[כְפַף]] kap bend, curve; Palm. [[כפתא]] niche, from [[כפף]] curve acc. to Vog:No. 70, p. 50);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[נַפְשִׁי]] ´[[כ]] Ps 57:7 my soul is bowed down; Inf. cstr. (trans.) [[לָכׂף כְּאַגְמׂן ראׁשׁוֹ]] Is 58:5 to bend down, like a rush, his head. Pt. pass. [[כְּפוּפִים]]([[הַ]]) those bowed down, in distress, humiliation, etc., Ps 145:14, Ps 146:8.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 s. [[מָרוֹם אִכַּף לֵאלֽהֵי]] Mic 6:6 with what shall I bow myself (in worship) toward the high God ?
